problems.title: Keeping your community project thriving — and fair — is hard
problems.subtitle: Working in community should be an advantage, but it's complex:
problems.misalignment: Contributors lose motivation when they don’t have a voice in decisions or see their effort fairly paid and recognized.
problems.findingAllies: Without real transparency and shared clarity, it’s hard for people to fully trust the process.
problems.internalConflicts: Manually tracking contributions and workload often generates conflicts, drains energy, and pulls focus away from what really matters.
problems.authenticity: Decentralized ideals are hard to sustain without the right tools to enable a simple, shared framework everyone trusts.

howItWorks.title: How AngoraSix works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple process to turn contributions into shared ownership, governance, and fair rewards — adaptable to how your community runs.

step1.title: Define the project rules
step1.description: We provide a simple framework to establish how the project will be managed: decisions, payments, and tasks. Everything is clear and visible for everyone from the start.
step1.imageAlt: Initial setup screen for project rules

step2.title: Connect with your management tools
step2.description: We integrate with the tools you already use — Trello, Notion, Jira, Github Projects, and more — to automatically track what each member contributes.
step2.imageAlt: Integration view showing external tools and tracked contributions

baseOutcome.title: Determine dynamic ownership
baseOutcome.description: Using tracked contributions and supplied data, AngoraSix helps determine how much value each contributor brings to the project — transparently and in real time.

outcome1.title: Shared decisions weighted by real contributions
outcome1.description: AngoraSix offers a governance system based on ownership — the more someone contributes, the more weight their vote has in decisions. Or you can define your own rules. Fair, without hierarchies or conflict.
outcome1.imageAlt: Governance dashboard showing weighted voting based on contributions

outcome2.title: Transparent and automatic income distribution
outcome2.description: Earnings are distributed based on contributions and agreed rules by connecting to a multi-signature shared wallet. Everyone receives what they deserve.
outcome2.imageAlt: Fund distribution screen showing automatic payments by contribution
